Yeah, seconding that.  Can't get the patch to take.  Anybody figured it out?

You can't get the patch to work with this, the proper NA install writes entries into your registry. The patch installer checks for these registries, thus without the proper install and not just overwriting files like this release does, the patch will not allow itself to install. Just that simple.

I installed the 1.3 patch over my reloaded version, worked like a charm. Get the 1.3 patch here:

http://files.filefront.com/Europa+Universalis+III+v13+Patch/;7725962;/fileinfo.html

After that, I installed this 15 MB file over my reloaded 1.3 game, and so far everything looks good. 

Unfortunately, I cannot install the most recent 2.1 patch for the expansion for the registry reasons mentionned by hyperbaric.

If anyone can make another 15 mb file or so that includes the 2.1 update, it would be much appreciated.

There's a torrent on Mininova with the installer. For the lazy folks, the key in the registry is:
[HKEY_Local_Machine]\Software\paradox interactive\Europa Universalis III

In that you put a String value called "Napoleon" and put it's value to 2.0

that's it.

Upgrade the game as usual.

Someone tell how you installed the update, to me says: Napoleons ambition isn't installed.

1: ersätt filer
2: kör-> regedt32.exe
3: [HKEY_Local_Machine]\Software\paradox interactive\Europa Universalis III
4: redigera/nytt/strängvärde
5: döp det till "Napoleon"
5: Högerklicka på den skapade "sträng-nyckeln" och skriv "2.0" i raden under "Data"
6: kör installationsfilen.
7: Klart

tacka Alexander

guys i had the same problem and couldn't install the patch. This is how i solved the problem:

1) Go to start, then choose Run
2) Type regedit
3) Now you have 2 choices
  a: Go to Edit, choose Find and type Europa or  paradox Interactive.
  b: find it manually for xp64bit its under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Paradox Interactive\HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Paradox Interactive\Europa Universalis III

Once you go to Europa Universalis 3 folder, right cliq on the blank space in the right window. Select new String Value and name it "Napoleon". The right cliq on it and select Modify, in the Value Data type exactly "2.0" nothing else will do. Close and exit. 

Many thanks to the OP for this method.
*I'm running Windows XP 64 bit so it might be slightly different for you.

PPS didn't even need to manually patch, 2.2 patch worked on it's own.

Aexiluus, Insanemus: solution of loading database problem. the directories common/common/technologies and map/map didn't exist, so the discfile.cpp cannot find them, so one level of directories missing. so in the common and the map directory create another common and map directory and copy the files located in the originating directories the new ones. it should work. goog luck.
thanks a lot for this addon !!
